name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mount Fuji Cherry Blossom: Serene Live Wallpaper for Chrome!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of *Mount Fuji* with cherry blossoms in full bloom with this stunning live wallpaper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This peaceful live wallpaper captures the iconic Mount Fuji, surrounded by a sea of delicate cherry blossoms swaying in the breeze. The soft, pink petals and majestic mountain create a tranquil and harmonious atmosphere, perfect for nature lovers or anyone seeking a calming backdrop.

Along with the serene visuals, popular site shortcuts for easy access, and a real-time date and time display. Download now and bring the timeless beauty of Mount Fuji and cherry blossoms to your Chrome browser!
